name: FoundryIACVaultManagementPolicy

statements: Allow user id ocid1.user.oc1..aaaaaaaa2j4yrahpkzkx2ug7fhiwqigebcf4w6pckdpijtsizvzlayuqslra to manage vaults in tenancy
